review: This is an very well made product that has impressed me so far. The design is simple and clean with obvious attention to detail. Just holding the small sleek remote makes it clear that it was designed with attention to the smallest details as even the material it's made out of feels like higher quality than the average remote. The system is extremely small (about the size of a piece of bread) and  easy to install. Even the most technology adverse person would have to be able to setup this system in minutes. It works great so far, is easy to navigate, and is very fast. I bought a game controller with the system and I've enjoyed playing some of the free games as well as Minecraft with my kids. My kids watch TV shows on a regular basis with Amazon prime and I was very pleasantly surprised a few days ago when I realized that I could watch the new Captain America and X-men movies before they were available at Redbox and without leaving my house to hunt down a DVD. I think this would be a great purchase even if the price was higher but considering how low the price is, this is a no-brainer as a great purchase.

review: This is the first device like this that I own, so I cannot compare to other devices but it works great. A lot for me to see on Prime and good quality, very happy.I would have given it 5 stars if not for the fact that I am already on my 4th set of batteries for the remote.Don't know if I have a defective remote or if this is how it is since the device itself cannot switch off and possibly keeps communicating with the remote long after I'm done. I started taking out the batteries when I'm finished and unplugging the device, just wish I don't have to keep doing this.
